name: Kishore Anna
greetingText: (Okay, who's going to make our terrible jokes now?)
wishText: May your next adventure be filled with bad jokes, questionable puns, and laughter that echoes through the halls!
text1: We were gonna write a sappy farewell...
textInChatBox: Kishore Anna, we'll miss your contagious energy, your ability to crack the worst jokes at the best times, and your uncanny knack for finding amazing lunch spots.....
text2: ...and all those moments you somehow turned work into a sitcom.
text3: But honestly, who are we kidding?
text4: You're going to rock this next chapter
outroText: Now, go forth and conquer! But seriously, Come to play Volleyball every friday, okay?
